name: The Eternal Collector
description:
Drive your train through an endless valley collecting scrap along the way. Use the scrap to upgrade your train carriages and to purchase new carriages. Build up enough scrap and you'll be able to purchase the Retirement Chair.

  • Encounter different weather conditions and other minor events that will impact your journey
  • Plan your upgrade purchases carefully to balance power generation and storage as well as scrap collection and storage.
  • Choose between fast, normal and slow modes depending on how challenging you want your journey to be.
